summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel, transmitting the government's expert notice, request for reciprocal disclosures, and 3500 material for the government's expert witness in the case US v. Maxwell. The materials were also sent on CD to Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

events.title: Government Expert Disclosure in US v. Maxwell
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office transmits its expert notice, request for reciprocal disclosures, and 3500 material for its expert witness to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel.

keyFacts: The document is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team regarding the case US v. Maxwell.
The government is providing its expert notice and 3500 material for its expert witness, and requesting reciprocal disclosures from the defense.
A copy of the materials was sent on CD to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
The email is dated April 23, 2021, during the pre-trial phase of Maxwell's prosecution.
